text: He amara raba! ‘Ami ejana ahbayakaka imanara pine ahbana karaibalai sunicho ye, ‘tomaloke tomalokara pratipalakara pine imana ana’. Seye ami imana anicho. He amara raba! ‘Tumi amara papasamuha ksama karai diya, arau amara trauti-bicyutisamuha dura karaa arau amaka satkarmaparaayana lokasakalara sahagami karai mrtyu pradana karaa’
